short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the UX for Unit4 / UBW

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improves two things:
* Total per day row is enhanced and work schedule row is subdued so that the important row is clearer
* Space out the action buttons to reduce risk of clicking the wrong one
